project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-line Tool
project_plan.description: Create a command-line Python tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. The user should be able to specify the input temperature and the desired output unit.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion logic from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
